CustomField.description: The type of account this Payout is sent to, such as a debit card or bank account. May be to a Payment Method (your Connected Account's debit card or bank account, or to a Payment Gateway such as your own bank account).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The type of account this Payout is sent to, such as a debit card or bank account. May be to a Payment Method (your Connected Account's debit card or bank account, or to a Payment Gateway such as your own bank account).
CustomField.label: Payout Destination Type
